The purpose of this site is to list List of all prayer area, including mosque, quiet room, etc, in Singapore at the moment. We may include other countries soon.

So, before you go out, check out this page and plan where to pray properly. Remember, there is no excuse not to pray. Even if there is no praying area nearby, you can always pray. Just bring your praying mate in case.

PrayWhere.com does not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided here. As such, if there is a wrong information or a not so accurate information, kindly connect to our facebook page and let the admin know.

Last but not least, share this with all your friends, for the benefits of everyone. :)

There is a little known prayer room here that I'd like to share with the community. It is located at level 21 of Tower 1, which is accessible via an access pass (which you can get from the reception on level 1). Once you leave the lift at level 21, walk to the carpeted area and turn left, walk past the mail room and turn left again. There are separate rooms for muslimin and muslimah, and each room is fully equipped with mats, kain, and there are taps in the room as well. For those working from levels 1 - 17 of Tower 1, you need to go up to level 17 and take the stairs up to level 18 before taking the lift to 21. This room is only for staff. This post was contributed by brother Muzhaffar.

How To Search For A Prayer Room / Corner?

We think it is about time that we write this topic. The website has been around for more than a year. Some of the feedbacks for our planned future upgrade was to include the ability to search, which already have, but its not so user friendly yet. So, in case you have been wondering on how to do a proper search. Here you go! There are 2 ways of doing it: 1. Through our website, PrayWhere From our website, you can utilize a search function. Key in the building name that you are in, or perhaps the area in general. For example, if you are at "Big Box", key in "Big Box". However, please note there is no search function available on mobile phones. So, if you are on mobile, do the second alternative. :) 2. Through Google. You type, "building name" AND "prayer room". For example, say you want to look out for prayer room at IMM. You do as below. Please note that the planned upgrade won't be so soon, as we are in the midst of meeting a few investors. Pray that we'd get some funds so that we can work on this on full-time basis. We enjoy managing this platform honestly. :)

Location: Parkway East Hospital, level 2 at Parkway East Medical Centre Blk (turn left after entering the main entrance) Small room which can accommodate 2-3 guests and its shared between muslimin and muslimah. Assalamualaikum, Like what we are doing? We are looking to expand and re-develop this platform from scratch. To do that, we need a substantial amount of capital. If you are a Muslim investor, and you uses our platform or FB page often, we are looking for you! If you are interested to invest in us, kindly go to our FB page, and drop us message with:
  1. Your name.
  2. Your email.
  3. How much are you willing to invest?
  4. How many percentage of the company that you expect?
  5. Why are you interested to invest in us?
If we think that you are the right match, we will reply back to you, and we will email to your our business plan! Then, we'll see how we can proceed from there after. We look forward to hear from you! :)

Unofficial place to pray at NEX shopping centre.
  1. Go to level 4r (rooftop). 
  2. Find the goods lift lobby near to the library. 
  3. Find the emergency staircase. Once you go inside it, there would be an arrow pointing the kiblah. 
  4. You need to bring your own prayer garments and sejadah. 
This post was contributed by brother Aqif.
